snippet: As chairwoman, Ms. Yellen will face an arduous task overseeing the gradual unwinding of stimulus measures, despite an uncomfortably high unemployment rate of 7 percent and subdued inflation.
abstract: Senate confirms Janet L Yellen as chairwoman of Federal Reserve, marking first time woman will lead country's central bank in its 100-year history; she will face arduous task of overseeing gradual unwinding of stimulus measures, despite an uncomfortably high unemployment rate of 7 percent and subdued inflation.
lead_paragraph: As chairwoman, Ms. Yellen will face an arduous task overseeing the gradual unwinding of stimulus measures, despite an uncomfortably high unemployment rate of 7 percent and subdued inflation.

headline.main: Yellen Wins Backing of Senators to Lead Fed
headline.print_headline: Yellen Wins Backing of Senators to Lead Fed
